name: node-clsi
description: A Node.js implementation of the CLSI LaTeX web-API

scripts.test:acceptance:wait_for_app: echo 'Waiting for app to be accessible' && while (! curl -s -o /dev/null localhost:3013/status) do sleep 1; done
scripts.test:acceptance:dir: npm -q run test:acceptance:wait_for_app && npm -q run test:acceptance:run -- $@
scripts.test:acceptance: npm run compile:app && npm run compile:acceptance_tests && npm run test:acceptance:_run -- $@
scripts.compile: npm run compile:app && npm run compile:test:acceptance && npm run compile:test:smoke
scripts.test:unit: npm run compile:app && npm run compile:unit_tests && npm run test:unit:_run -- $@
scripts.compile:unit_tests: [ -e test/unit ] && coffee -o test/unit/js -c test/unit/coffee || echo 'No unit tests to compile'
scripts.compile:acceptance_tests: [ -e test/acceptance ] && coffee -o test/acceptance/js -c test/acceptance/coffee || echo 'No acceptance tests to compile'
scripts.compile:all: npm run compile:app && npm run compile:unit_tests && npm run compile:acceptance_tests

author: James Allen <james@sharelatex.com>
